snippet.title: Rise of Fox Hero - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise of Fox Hero is a colorful 3D platformer with fun combat and puzzle elements. Armed with a sword and a shield, jump and fight your way through beautiful and colorful levels.

Launching on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and Xbox on February 17th

🦊 https://linktr.ee/riseoffoxhero


| About 2Awesome Studio's Partner Initiative |

2Awesome Studio's Partner Initiative helps bring awesome games to players everywhere! 

Follow along for more exciting Indie game news:

▶️ https://linktr.ee/2awesomestudio
